mapper.insert: insert into appeal_form (id, order_no, order_item_no, buyer_id, weidian_id, pic_urls, status, reject_reason, appeal_result, create_at, seller_time, express_info_id, refund_reason_id, refund_type_id, agent_create_at, agent_comment, end_at, appeal_comment) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weidianId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appealResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sellerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expressInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundReasonId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refundTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{agentCreateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appealComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update appeal_form set order_no = #{orderNo}, order_item_no = #{orderItemNo}, buyer_id = #{buyerId}, weidian_id = #{weidianId}, status = #{status}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason}, appeal_result = #{appealResult}, seller_time = #{sellerTime}, express_info_id = #{expressInfoId}, refund_reason_id = #{refundReasonId}, refund_type_id = #{refundTypeId}, agent_create_at = #{agentCreateAt}, agent_comment = #{agentComment}, end_at = #{endAt}, appeal_comment = #{appealComment} where id = #{id};
